evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek to declare these acts of the President unconstitutional, unlawful, and otherwise in excess of any constitutional or statutory authority; to hold unlawful and set aside the acts of agency defendants implementing his orders as unlawful and in violation of the Administrative Procedure Act, 5 U.S.C. § 706(2)(A), (C) and (D); and to enjoin this unconstitutional reorganization of the federal government without legislative authority.

extracted.value: Declare these acts of the President unconstitutional, unlawful, and otherwise in excess of any constitutional or statutory authority
